participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Creative and energetic, with a love for art and fitness.
participant_1.background: I would love to learn more about how to help my cats stay cool in hot weather. I still enjoy my meat but have become a responsible adult. I fantasize about living in another country. I draw comics. I like to work out at the gym to Christian electronic dance music.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Caring and supportive, enjoys family time and helping others.
participant_2.background: I am not the best at keeping up with my family because I often do not watch the news or television, and I can be shy at times. Helping people and trying new things are two of my favorite things to do. I want a home with a gym and a racquetball court so I can stay in shape and enjoy my favorite sport. I love to watch my daughters dance ballet. My car broke down last week.

content.text: Hey, how's it going?
Good! Just got home from work. How about you?
I'm doing pretty well, thanks! How's your day been?
It was good! My daughters had ballet practice after school, so I got to watch them.
That's great! I'm sure they did a great job.
They did! They always do so well.
What's your favorite thing about your daughters?
I love their energy and their sense of humor. They always know how to make me laugh.
They sound like great kids.
They are! I'm so lucky to have them in my life.
That's awesome.
So, what are your hobbies?
I draw comics and work out at the gym to Christian electronic dance music.
That's cool! I've always wanted to learn how to draw comics.
It's not too hard! You just need a pencil and some paper.
Maybe I'll give it a try.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Okay, I'll see what I can do.
Great! I'm sure you'll be great at it.
Thanks
